About Us

Durrant’s Haven is a non-governmental organization in Ghana protecting children’s rights and focusing on vulnerable victims both locally and internationally. Founded by Patience Durrant in May 2020. Our main efforts focus on addressing issues relating to children especially street children and orphans.The DH will be providing services in a form of excellence care to the vulnerable children to be housed at the center.
